body: A coruscating ray springs from your hand. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to strike a target. The subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+1 per two caster levels (maximum 1d6+5). The subject's Strength score cannot drop below 1. A successful Fortitude save reduces this penalty by half. This penalty does not stack with itself. Apply the highest penalty instead.
description: Ray causes 1d6 Str penalty + 1 per 2 levels.
level_text: Arcanist: 1; Bloodrager: 1; Magus: 1; Sorcerer: 1; Witch: 1; Wizard: 1
name: Ray Of Enfeeblement
